name: hvnsnt
description:
a slice-of-life visual novel about revenge, personhood, and other baggage no one wants. or do they?

  • be an angel
  • make exciting new connections
  • read a book
  • what was that about revenge again?

this demo serves as an introduction to the main characters. it takes ~40mins to complete and includes 4 cgs.

the game contains religious themes as well as allusions to abuse & dysphoria.
